server module

server.main()[source]

This is the main loop of the server. It will listen for messages and will handle them accordingly.

server.resendMessage(message, address, userID, packageNumber)[source]

Function to resend a message after a certain amount of time. It will be called by a thread and therminates itselft. :param address: Address to send the message to :param userID: UserID of the user to send the message to :param packageNumber: Package number of the message to resend :return: Returns if the message was sent successfully or the maximum amount of resends was reached
